title: How to Make Pink Brownies

steps.headline: Mix the dry ingredients.
steps.description: Place the sugar, flour, and vanilla into a large baking bowl. Mix ingredients thoroughly with a whisk or wooden spoon.

steps.headline: Mix in melted butter, food coloring, and cocoa powder.
steps.description: Add four drops of pink coloring and two drops of green. Pour the cocoa powder in the bowl as well. Stir.

steps.headline: Bake for 6 minutes in the microwave on high.
steps.description: Pour brownie mixture in a small, glass tray. Bake on HIGH for six whole minutes. Watch as brownies rise. If brownies are watery and have not risen, place them in microwave again for an addition thirty seconds or a minute.

steps.headline: Take brownies out of the microwave and have them cool.
steps.description: Have them cool for about 3-4 minutes.

steps.headline: Frost with pink frosting and jam.
steps.description: Use a butter knife to lather frosting and jam over brownies. Use can also use a frosting pipe to make letters or shapes.

text: Mix the dry ingredients. Place the sugar, flour, and vanilla into a large baking bowl. Mix ingredients thoroughly with a whisk or wooden spoon. Mix in melted butter, food coloring, and cocoa powder. Add four drops of pink coloring and two drops of green. Pour the cocoa powder in the bowl as well. Stir. Bake for 6 minutes in the microwave on high. Pour brownie mixture in a small, glass tray. Bake on HIGH for six whole minutes. Watch as brownies rise. If brownies are watery and have not risen, place them in microwave again for an addition thirty seconds or a minute. Take brownies out of the microwave and have them cool. Have them cool for about 3-4 minutes. Frost with pink frosting and jam. Use a butter knife to lather frosting and jam over brownies. Use can also use a frosting pipe to make letters or shapes. Enjoy!
